title: 14 Chic Loungewear Sets to Unwind in This Season
description: One of the many things we've learned over the past few years is the value of having chic loungewear sets on hand when you just can't bring yourself to leave the house. Heading into cozy season, we anticipate that we'll be seeing (and enjoying!) even more of those lazy, couch-ridden days in the coming months - and being the planners that we are, we're also prepping our closets accordingly by investing in a few new matching loungewear sets to help get us through the season's coziest months. We're talking sweat set pairings, T-shirt and short duos for those who run warm, four-piece sets that can be mixed and matched, and so much more. Since we're not in the business of gatekeeping shopping secrets here at PS, we're happy to report that there are a lot of great winter loungewear sets to stock up on this season - and all from some of our favorite fashion brands like Amazon, Free People, Skims, Calvin Klein, and so many more. Whether you're in the market for some affordable loungewear sets, are looking to invest in a few luxurious styles ahead of winter and the forthcoming holiday season, or just scoping out the softest loungewear sets in the hopes of upgrading your work-from-home wardrobe with a cozier touch, we've got you covered with some of the best matching styles to shop (and live in!) this season - and at every price point, too. Browse our curated shopping guide below for the best loungewear sets, and prepare to unwind in style this fall.
author: Marisa Petrarca
excerpt: From matching two-piece sets to cozy knit jumpsuits, onesies, sweatpants, and more, these are the best loungewear sets to cozy up in this fall.

One of the many things we've learned over the past few years is the value of having chic loungewear sets on hand when you just can't bring yourself to leave the house. Heading into cozy season, we anticipate that we'll be seeing (and enjoying!) even more of those lazy, couch-ridden days in the coming months — and being the planners that we are, we're also prepping our closets accordingly by investing in a few new matching loungewear sets to help get us through the season's coziest months. We're talking sweat set pairings, T-shirt and short duos for those who run warm, four-piece sets that can be mixed and matched, and so much more.

Since we're not in the business of gatekeeping shopping secrets here at PS, we're happy to report that there are a lot of great winter loungewear sets to stock up on this season — and all from some of our favorite fashion brands like Amazon, Free People, Skims, Calvin Klein, and so many more. Whether you're in the market for some affordable loungewear sets, are looking to invest in a few luxurious styles ahead of winter and the forthcoming holiday season, or just scoping out the softest loungewear sets in the hopes of upgrading your work-from-home wardrobe with a cozier touch, we've got you covered with some of the best matching styles to shop (and live in!) this season — and at every price point, too.

Browse our curated shopping guide below for the best loungewear sets, and prepare to unwind in style this fall.

Best Rib-Knit Set

Ekouaer Pajamas 2 Piece Lounge Set ($25-$30)

This soft and stretchy loungewear set comes with an oversize, shoulder-drop tee and fitted biker shorts. It comes in a bunch of different colors and shoppers describe it as comfy and versatile.

Best 4-Piece Set

Live2Lounge Women's Pajama Set ($35-$36)

You can't beat the price of this four-piece set, which comes with a wrap cardigan, T-shirt, tank top, and jogger pajama bottoms. You can mix and match the pieces to your heart's content. Choose from four colors: olive green (pictured here), black, grey, and red.

Best Onesie

Skims Rib Stretch Cotton Romper ($39-$78)

This onesie is so comfortable, you might forget that you're wearing clothing at all. Whether you're heading out for a quick errand, are embarking on your afternoon walk, or just plan to spend the day doing absolutely nothing (the dream!), this stretchy style is a piece you'll be reaching for again and again.

Best Sweatshirt and Shorts Set

ANRABESS Sweatsuit & Lounge Shorts Set ($39)

If you're looking for a classic no-fuss crewneck and short set, this one's a hit among Amazon shoppers. "I've already bought this in 3 other colors, I love it that much," writes one of many who've given it a five-star rating. "The material is thick and cozy, and soft on the inside. I have to hold myself back from buying every single color. "

Best Stylish Set

Tanming Sweater Set ($40)

This sweater set is an ideal choice when you want to maintain a polished appearance without sacrificing comfort. While it's not a unique find, as it's been popular on social media, you can take comfort in the numerous positive reviews it's received.

Best Wide-Leg Set

Viottiset Women's 2 Piece Outfit ($53)

You'll adore this outfit not just for lounging at home but also for stepping out in style. A happy reviewer who awarded it a five-star rating shared: "I lounge in it but one day I dressed it up put on some wedges and some gold jewelry and got so many compliments."

Best Linen Set

Quince 100% European Linen Pajama Set ($60, originally $108)

Investing in a high-quality linen loungewear set is a choice you won't regret. This one is crafted from 100 percent European linen that's lightweight, hypoallergenic, and breathable, and it boasts a relaxed fit for a lived-in look.

Best Two-Tone Set

Superdown Renna Two Tone Sweatpants ($64) and Superdown Renna Cropped Hoodie ($68)

If it's important to you that your lounge set is eye-catching, look no further than this two-tone design from Superdown. The top is hooded, with a front zipper closure, a cropped design, and side-slant pockets, and the bottoms are elasticized, with a drawstring closure and pockets.

Best Dress

Cozy Earth Rib-Knit V-Neck Tank Lounge Dress ($101, originally $155)

Who says loungewear styles can't be chic? This lounge dress is a best-seller at Cozy Earth — and for good reason. The breezy dress is wrapped in an ultra-plush, breathable and cozy material, allowing you to easily unwind in the style at home and look seriously adorable while doing it.

Best Embroidered Set

Sani Embroidered Lounge Set ($120)

"Currently living in this set," writes a Nordstrom shopper who gave it a five-star rating. "Sleep. Eat. Work. Grocery shop. Lunch with friends? Still in this set. Buying all the colors and styles because I'm not sure if I will be wearing anything else!" The soft, navy-blue fabric is decorated in embroidered leopards and features a relaxed fit and elastic waist.

Best Slouchy Set

Free People Hailee Turtleneck Set ($128)

We have major heart eyes for this Free People turtleneck set. Reviewers hail the style for its ultra-comfortable qualities that are matched only by its (surprisingly!) lightweight nature. Bonus: this Free People loungewear set also comes in a number of different colors, so you can stock up on several variations of the style.

- Additional reporting by Natasha Marsh

Marisa Petrarca (she/her) is a contributing editor for PS Shopping and has more than five years of experience writing and editing beauty, fashion, and lifestyle content. Her work has been featured in Cosmopolitan, Allure, and InStyle, among others

Natasha Marsh (she/her) is a freelance writer who writes about fashion, beauty, and lifestyle. Prior to freelancing, she held styling staff positions at The Wall Street Journal, Burberry, Cosmopolitan, British GQ, and Harper's Bazaar.
